parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3 </value></part><part><name/>=<value> Game

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56</value></part><part><name>Game Version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Menu </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns data stored in menu entry on given path. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[menuData]] [idc, path] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control [[menuData]] path </value></part><part><name>Alternative Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>Alternative Parameter 1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>Alternative Parameter 2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[String]]  </value></part><part><name>Alternative Return Value</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value>  <code><template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Create an entry which will return its data once clicked</value></part></template>
[[private]] _ctrlMenuStrip = [[findDisplay]] 313 [[displayCtrl]] 120;
[[private]] _indexMain = _ctrlMenuStrip [[menuAdd]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[], "Custom Tools"];
[[private]] _indexData = _ctrlMenuStrip [[menuAdd]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[_indexMain],"This entry will print its data to system chat when clicked"];
_ctrlMenuStrip [[menuSetData]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[_indexMain,_indexData], "<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[[objNull]],'Some String',[[true]]]"];
_ctrlMenuStrip [[menuSetAction]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[_indexMain,_indexData], "[[systemChat]] ([[findDisplay]] 313 [[displayCtrl]] 120 [[menuData]] ([[menuHover]] ([[findDisplay]] 313 [[displayCtrl]] 120)));"];
</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>


</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[menuSetData]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
